Question & Options:
What themes are explored in relation to Asian American identity in *Everything Everywhere All at Once*?
Options:
A. A) The oppressive force of cultural assimilation
B. B) Nihilism as a response to identity struggles
C. C) The potential for resistance through embracing heritage
D. D) The exploration of Asian pessimism
Correct Answer: A) The oppressive force of cultural assimilation, B) Nihilism as a response to identity struggles, C) The potential for resistance through embracing heritage

Question & Options:
What themes are explored in the film *Everything Everywhere All at Once*?
Options:
A. A) Nihilism
B. B) Asian American identity
C. C) Cultural assimilation
D. D) All of the above
Correct Answer: A) Nihilism, B) Asian American identity, C) Cultural assimilation
